text:
Gizele Maria Dias da Costa (born 29 October 1977) is a Brazilian Paralympic sitting volleyball player. She is part of the Brazil women's national sitting volleyball team.
She won the bronze medal, Brazil's first in the sport, at the 2016 Summer Paralympic Games in Rio de Janeiro, after defeating the Ukrainian women's national sitting volleyball team by 3 sets to 0.

annotations.surface_form: Brazil women's national sitting volleyball team
Ukrainian women's national sitting volleyball team
